metadata.name: First Liquid
metadata.description: This is the beginning of my work in Foundation! I tried to go further this time to make things and polish them to be more attractive! And guess !! you will get something in return. First of all, I tried to use videos of a few seconds in my work instead of photos. Then I thought that it would be better if I work on them and add some of my creativity to them. After I skipped these steps, I tried to make a loop, so I reversed the video. I finished my work by making videos and animations. I used some sounds and made the one you see. For the first few works, I considered a large number so that once my work was shown in the best possible state. this is just the first
